occupantEntered(String) - Method in class TeamOrange.instantmessenger.models.AppMuc
This function is called whenever a new user enters the muc
occupantExited(String) - Method in class TeamOrange.instantmessenger.models.AppMuc
This function is called whenever a user exits the muc
occupantKicked(String) - Method in class TeamOrange.instantmessenger.models.AppMuc
This function is called whenever a user is kicked from the muc
onAcceptContactRequestEvent(String) - Method in class TeamOrange.instantmessenger.controllers.AcceptOrDeclineContactRequestController
This is called by HomeScreen when the onAcceptContactRequestEvent occurs If the contact is not already in the contacts list, then it adds the contact to the contact list, and tells the server to add the contact.
onBlockContactEvent(String) - Method in class TeamOrange.instantmessenger.controllers.ContactManagementController
This is called when a contact is to be blocked.
onClose() - Method in class TeamOrange.instantmessenger.App
This is called by GuiBase when the application is closed It shuts down the thread within connectionController, which may be trying to connect.
onConnected() - Method in class TeamOrange.instantmessenger.controllers.ConnectionController
This is called when the app is detected to become connected.
onConnectionEvent(ConnectionEventEnum) - Method in class TeamOrange.instantmessenger.controllers.ConnectionController
This is called when any connection event occurs.
onDeclineContactRequestEvent(String) - Method in class TeamOrange.instantmessenger.controllers.AcceptOrDeclineContactRequestController
This is called by HomeScreen when the onDeclineContactRequestEvent occurs Removes the contact-add request Alerts the user of the response Tells homescreen to reload
onDeleteContactEvent(String) - Method in class TeamOrange.instantmessenger.controllers.ContactManagementController
This is called when a contact is to be deleted.
onDisconnected() - Method in class TeamOrange.instantmessenger.controllers.ConnectionController
This is called when the app is detected to become disconnected.
onPress(String) - Method in interface TeamOrange.instantmessenger.lambda.ChatButtonPress
 
onRequestContactAddSent(Message) - Method in class TeamOrange.instantmessenger.xmpp.BabblerBase
This is called when a request contact add has beeen successfully sent.
onRequestDeleteFromContacts(String) - Method in class TeamOrange.instantmessenger.controllers.ContactManagementController
This is called when this user is requested by another user to remove that user from their contacts.
openChat(String) - Method in interface TeamOrange.instantmessenger.lambda.ChatWithContactEvent
 
OpenChatController - Class in TeamOrange.instantmessenger.controllers
This controls the flow when the user opens a chat session
